name: Clawatch
description: Connect Clawatch device to OpenClaw for remote chat and control

apiUrl.description: WebSocket URL. Default is set; override via CLAWATCH_API_URL or OPENCLAW_CLAWATCH_API_URL env var if needed.

ttsSystemPrompt.description: System prompt for TTS-friendly replies. Empty = use default (short, natural speech).

interimStatusEnabled.description: Enable interim status messages before long-running tools (exec, web search, etc).
